MagnetsSystem

Class Magnet

  • java.lang.Object
    • MagnetsSystem.Magnet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineMagnet, PointMagnet

    public abstract class Magnet
extends java.lang.Object
    A magnet is an entity which attracts particles to itself. Attractive force is computed as a gravitation force : f = k / dÂ² (f = force, k = constant, d = distance)
